item.title: ERG 计划明年在哈萨克斯坦生产关键矿物镓
item.description: 欧亚资源集团（Eurasian Resources Group）周一发布消息称，该公司计划投资2000万美元，从明年起在哈萨克斯坦利用铝土矿生产关键矿物镓。【原文：Eurasian Resources Group plans to invest $20 million in facilities to produce critical mineral gallium in Kazakhstan from next year, from the bauxite ore it processes to produce alumina, the company said in a release on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉希望美国对机器人出租车的部署情况不予公开
item.description: 特斯拉在周一发布的一封信中告诉美国监管机构，特斯拉对其在得克萨斯州部署的机器人出租车安全性问题的所有答复都属于商业机密信息，不应公开。【原文：Tesla told U.S. regulators that all of its answers to questions on the safety of its robotaxi deployment in Texas are confidential business information and should not be made public, according to a letter released Monday.】

item.title: 北方信托称将全力保持独立性
item.description: 华尔街日报》的一篇报道称，纽约梅隆银行已与这家资产和财富管理公司接触，表达了合并的意向，而北方信托周一表示，该银行将全力保持独立。【原文：Northern Trust is fully committed to remaining independent, the bank said on Monday, after a Wall Street Journal report said Bank of New York Mellon had approached the asset and wealth manager to express interest in a merger.】

item.title: 标普全球称，哈佛大学的 AAA 评级目前可抵御特朗普的威胁
item.description: S&P Global公司表示，哈佛大学和其他美国常春藤盟校的三A评级应该能够抵御唐纳德-特朗普的美国政府在税收和捐赠基金方面造成的最极端和最协调的威胁。【原文：The triple A ratings of Harvard and other U.S. Ivy League colleges should be able to withstand all but the most extreme and coordinated tax and endowment fund threats posed by Donald Trump's U.S. administration, S&P Global has said.】

item.title: 英国石油公司等从伊拉克油田撤出员工，产量保持稳定
item.description: 国营巴士拉石油公司（Basra Oil Company）周一表示，英国石油公司（BP）、埃尼公司（Eni）和道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）已开始从其运营的伊拉克油田撤出外国人员。【原文：BP , Eni and TotalEnergies have begun evacuating foreign personnel from Iraqi oilfields where they operate, state-run Basra Oil Company said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国众议院设备禁止使用 WhatsApp - 备忘录
item.description: 根据周一发给众议院工作人员的一份备忘录，美国众议院的所有设备已禁止使用 Meta Platforms WhatsApp 消息服务。【原文：Meta Platforms WhatsApp messaging service has been banned on all U.S. House of Representatives devices, according to a memo sent to House staff on Monday.】

item.title: 首批机器人出租车在德克萨斯州奥斯汀上路后，特斯拉股价大涨
item.description: 特斯拉股价周一大涨 10%，原因是该公司推出了期待已久的机器人出租车服务，首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）多年来一直将该服务视为推动这家电动汽车制造商获得高估值的关键因素。【原文：Tesla shares jumped 10% on Monday, lifted by the long-awaited launch of the company's robotaxi service that CEO Elon Musk has for years championed as a key driver of the electric vehicle maker's lofty valuation.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会接受关于宏盟-Interpublic 合并的同意令
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周一表示，已接受一项拟议的同意令，以解决广告公司宏盟集团（Omnicom）斥资 135 亿美元收购竞争对手 Interpublic 公司过程中可能存在的反竞争协调问题。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Monday it had accepted a proposed consent order to resolve potential anti-competitive coordination in the advertising agency Omnicom's $13.5 billion acquisition of rival Interpublic .】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼着眼于广泛的银行资本改革
item.description: 美联储最高监管官员周一表示，即将重写的银行杠杆率规则只是审查 "扭曲的 "银行资本要求的 "第一步"。【原文：The Federal Reserve's top regulatory official said on Monday that an upcoming rewrite of bank leverage rules is just a "first step" in reviewing "distorted" bank capital requirements.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，高盛在全公司范围内推出人工智能助手
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，高盛周一宣布在全公司范围内推出一款人工智能助手，这是一款由生成式人工智能驱动的工具，旨在提高工作效率。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Monday announced a firmwide launch of an artificial intelligence assistant, a tool driven by generative AI, to boost productivity, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼对在 7 月政策会议上降息持开放态度
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）最近被美国总统特朗普任命为央行的最高银行监管者，她周一表示，降息的时机可能很快就会到来，因为她越来越担心就业市场的风险，而不太担心关税会导致通胀问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman, recently tapped by President Trump as the central bank’s top bank overseer, said Monday the time to cut interest rates may be fast approaching as she is growing more worried about risks to the job market and is less concerned tariffs will cause an inflation problem.】

item.title: 美国 5 月成屋销售上升；抵押贷款利率仍是制约因素
item.description: 美国 5 月成屋销售意外增长，但在抵押贷款利率高企的情况下，趋势依然疲软。【原文：U.S. existing home sales unexpectedly increased in May, but the trend remained weak amid high mortgage rates.】

item.title: 报告显示，华为新笔记本电脑使用中国制造的旧芯片，美国禁令阻碍了中芯国际的发展
item.description: 加拿大研究公司TechInsights周一表示，华为技术公司的新款MateBook Fold笔记本电脑采用了中芯国际制造的老一代芯片，这凸显了美国出口限制是如何阻碍中国顶级代工厂向下一代半导体制造迈进的。【原文：Huawei Technologies' new MateBook Fold laptop is powered by an older-generation chip made by SMIC , highlighting how U.S. export curbs are hindering China's top foundry from advancing to next-generation semiconductor manufacturing, Canadian research firm TechInsights said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国商业活动放缓；价格压力增大
item.description: 美国商业活动在 6 月份略有放缓，尽管在唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口商品积极征收关税的影响下，物价进一步上涨，这表明通胀有可能在下半年加速。【原文：U.S. business activity slowed marginally in June, though prices increased further amid President Donald Trump's aggressive tariffs on imported goods, suggesting that an acceleration in inflation was likely in the second half of the year.】

item.title: 自由媒体获得欧盟监管机构对 MotoGP 交易的批准
item.description: 欧盟委员会（European Commission）周一表示，一级方程式赛车所有者自由媒体公司（Liberty Media）收购拥有 MotoGP 的多纳体育公司（Dorna Sports）的交易获得了欧盟监管机构的无条件批准。【原文：Formula One owner Liberty Media received unconditional clearance from EU regulators for its acquisition of Dorna Sports, which owns MotoGP, the European Commission said on Monday.】

item.title: Wealthfront 公司秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 金融科技平台 Wealthfront Corporation 周一披露，该公司已秘密申请在美国首次公开募股，投资者对新上市企业的兴趣与日俱增。【原文：Fintech platform Wealthfront Corporation disclosed on Monday that it had confidentially filed for a U.S. initial public offering, as investors show increasing interest in new listings.】

item.title: Fiserv 因推出稳定币计划而股价上涨
item.description: Fiserv 公布推出稳定币的计划后，其股价在周一盘前交易中上涨了 6%，随着加密资产逐渐成为主流，越来越多的美国公司加入了探索稳定币技术的行列。【原文：Fiserv shares rose 6% in premarket trading on Monday after it unveiled plans to launch a stablecoin, joining a growing number of U.S. companies exploring the technology as the crypto asset moves into the mainstream.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，华平投资公司正在洽谈出售印度 SBI 通用保险公司的股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，总部位于美国的私募股权公司华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）正在洽谈出售其在印度国家银行一般保险部门的股份。【原文：U.S.-based private equity firm Warburg Pincus is in talks to sell its stake in State Bank of India’s general insurance unit, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国投资者斥资 10 亿美元并购比特币财务公司
item.description: 美国投资者和企业家安东尼-庞皮里亚诺（Anthony Pompliano）周一宣布成立一家新的比特币财务公司，该公司的资产负债表上将持有多达 10 亿美元的全球最大加密货币。【原文：U.S. investor and entrepreneur Anthony Pompliano announced on Monday the creation of a new bitcoin treasury company that would hold up to $1 billion of the world's largest cryptocurrency on its balance sheet.】

item.title: Anthony Pompliano 的加密企业 ProCap Financial 将通过 SPAC 交易上市
item.description: 这位美国企业家周一表示，安东尼-庞莱亚诺（Anthony Pompliano）的加密风险投资公司ProCap Financial将通过与空头支票工具哥伦布圆环资本公司（Columbus Circle Capital Corp）合并的方式在美国上市。【原文：Anthony Pompliano's crypto venture ProCap Financial will go public in the U.S. through a merger with blank-check vehicle Columbus Circle Capital Corp , the American entrepreneur said on Monday.】

item.title: 通用磨坊推出 "新鲜 "蓝水牛狗粮
item.description: 通用磨坊（General Mills）将推出新版蓝水牛（Blue Buffalo）狗用宠物食品，旨在与 Freshpet 和风险投资支持的 The Farmer's Dog 等流行品牌竞争。【原文：General Mills is introducing a fresh version of its Blue Buffalo pet food for dogs, aimed at competing with popular brands such as Freshpet and venture capital-backed The Farmer's Dog.】

item.title: 客户服务人工智能初创公司 Decagon 融资 1.31 亿美元
item.description: Decagon 是一家以人工智能为动力提供客户服务解决方案的初创公司，该公司周一表示，已在一轮融资中筹集了 1.31 亿美元，估值达 15 亿美元。【原文：Decagon, a startup providing customer service solutions powered by artificial intelligence, said on Monday it had raised $131 million in a funding round that valued it at $1.5 billion.】

item.title: 金融数据公司 FactSet 第三季度利润下降，原因是客户减少支出
item.description: 金融数据公司 FactSet 周一公布，受宏观经济不确定性导致客户支出放缓的影响，第三季度利润下降。【原文：Financial data firm FactSet on Monday reported a fall in third-quarter profit, pressured by slower client spending amid ongoing macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴将把餐饮外卖和旅行社平台并入核心电子商务业务
item.description: 阿里巴巴周一表示，将把旗下餐饮外卖平台 Ele.me 和在线旅行社 Fliggy 并入其核心电子商务业务，以便在竞争加剧的情况下精简业务。【原文：Alibaba on Monday said it will merge its food delivery platform Ele.me and online travel agency Fliggy into its core e-commerce business as the Chinese group streamlines operations amid intensifying competition.】

item.title: 诺和诺德因减肥药销售问题终止与 Hims & Hers 的合作
item.description: 诺和诺德公司周一表示，将停止与Hims & Hers Health公司在减肥药销售方面的合作。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Monday it would halt its collaboration with Hims & Hers Health over the sale of weight loss drugs.】

item.title: 荷美尔食品公司前首席执行官杰弗里-埃廷格将临时复出
item.description: 荷美尔食品公司（Hormel Foods）周一表示，前首席执行官杰弗里-埃廷格（Jeffrey Ettinger）将从 7 月 14 日起重返 Skippy 花生酱生产商，临时掌舵 15 个月。【原文：Hormel Foods said on Monday former CEO Jeffrey Ettinger will return to helm the Skippy peanut butter maker on an interim basis for 15 months starting July 14.】

item.title: 美国电价飙升，残酷热浪给电网带来压力
item.description: 由于家庭和企业为躲避笼罩美国东半部的酷热气浪而开动空调，美国电价飙升至入冬以来的最高点，给地区电网造成压力。【原文：U.S. power prices soared to their highest since the winter as homes and businesses cranked up their air conditioners to escape a brutal heat wave blanketing the eastern half of the country, stressing regional power grids.】

item.title: 早间竞标：石油保持平静，中东冲突仍在继续
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价下跌，因为肥胖症管道面临投资者审查
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）实验性肥胖症药物 CagriSema 的详细试验数据加剧了投资者对其与竞争对手礼来（Eli Lilly）产品线竞争力的担忧，该公司股价周一最多下跌了 3.5%。【原文：Shares in Novo Nordisk fell as much as 3.5% on Monday after detailed trial data on its experimental obesity drug CagriSema fuelled investor concerns about its competitiveness against rival Eli Lilly's pipeline.】

item.title: Eurazeo 领投德国人工智能公司 aedifion 2000 万美元融资轮
item.description: 法国私募股权公司Eurazeo周一表示，已牵头为德国以房地产为重点的人工智能技术公司acedifion筹集了1700万欧元（2000万美元）的资金。【原文：French private equity firm Eurazeo has led a 17-million-euro ($20 million) fund-raising round for German property-focused AI tech company aedifion, said the companies on Monday.】
